metadata.title: CVE-2022-21692 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymously share files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. In affected versions anyone with access to the chat environment can write messages disguised as another chat participant.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
